description.value: Your mercy transcends the bounds of life and death. Add ultimate mercy to the types of mercy you can provide. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Mercy], you can target a creature that died since your last turn to return it to life. The target returns to life with 1 Hit Point and becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Wounded]{Wounded 1}. You can't return the target to life if it died from @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Disintegrate] or a death effect. The creature gains the other benefits of @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Lay on Hands] after it returns to life.
